About Me

I am currently a high school student in Grade 11 at Sandwich Secondary in LaSalle, Ontario. I love working with computers and solving complex problems. At school, my favourite subjects are computer, math and science related. Through self-teaching and projects I have completed, I have developed many new skills. My goals for the future involve attending university to study in the fields of Computer Science or Engineering.

In my free time I enjoy exercising, working on projects, and playing sports.

Feel free to contact me at any time via email. I also encourage you to view my github account and resume.
